info.description:
This API provides all the functions needed to manage 
the JABC HR system.
info.title: JABC

tags.name: Employee
tags.description:
Provides access to all employee data and history, manage Performances of employees,
Vacations and Documents for the onboarding process

tags.name: Reports
tags.description: Provides functions to generate and export reports

tags.name: Roles
tags.description: Allows the customization of the employee roles

tags.name: Document
tags.description: Manage the onboarding process of new employees

tags.name: Vacation
tags.description: Manage the vacation requests from employees

get.description:
This returns all the Employees of the system. 
If [term] is provided this returns the Employees of the system that match with the [term].

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: Search term for filter the data

post.description: Will create a new Employee with the provided data in body

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: employee
parameters.description: Employee data

get.description: Will return the Employee that matches with the provided [id]

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the searched Employee

put.description: Will update an Employee with the provided data in body if the Employee matches the [id]

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the Employee to be updated

parameters.name: employee
parameters.description: Employee data

parameters.name: idAdmin
parameters.description: Who is updating the employee

delete.description: Will delete (deactivate) an Employee if the Employee matches the [id]

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the Employee to be deleted

parameters.name: idAdmin
parameters.description: Who is deleting the employee

post.description: Sets the employee with [id] to be managed by the employee with [idManager]

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Employee to be managed by another

parameters.name: idManager
parameters.description: Employee that will manage the employee with [id]

delete.description: Deletes the relation between employee with [id] and the employee with [idManager]

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Employee to be unmanaged by another

parameters.name: idManager
parameters.description: Employee that will stop managing the employee with [id]

get.summary: get all the Employees that are managed by employee with [idManager]
get.description: This returns all the Employees that are managed by employee with [idManager].

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: idManager
parameters.description: Employee that will manage the employee with [id]

get.summary: get all the history of the employee with [id]
get.description: This returns all the history data of the employee with [id].

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the searched Employee

get.summary: get all the Documents of the employee with [id]
get.description:
This returns all the Documents of the system. 
If [term] is provided this returns the Documents of the Employee that match with the [term].

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: Search term for filter the data

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the searched Employee

post.summary: creates a new Document for the employee with [id]
post.description: Will create a new Document with the provided data in body

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the searched Employee

parameters.name: document
parameters.description: Document data

get.summary: get all the Performances of the employee with [id]
get.description:
This returns all the Performances of the system.
If [term] is provided this returns the Performances of the Employee that match with the [term].

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: Search term for filter the data

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the searched Employee

post.summary: creates a new Performance for the employee with [id]
post.description: Will create a new Performance with the provided data in body

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the searched Employee

parameters.name: performance
parameters.description: Performance data

get.summary: get all the Vacations of the employee with [id]
get.description:
This returns all the Vacations of the system. 
If [term] is provided this returns the Vacations of the Employee that match with the [term].

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: Search term for filter the data

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the searched Employee

post.summary: creates a new Vacation for the employee with [id]
post.description: Will create a new Vacation with the provided data in body

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the searched Employee

parameters.name: vacation
parameters.description: Vacation data

post.summary: sign in the employee into the system

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Employee login data

get.description:
Will return the Vacation that matches with the provided [id] from 
the Employee with [id]

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the searched Vacation

put.description:
Will update an Vacation with the provided data in body 
if the Vacation matches the [id]

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the searched Vacation

parameters.name: vacation
parameters.description: Vacation data

delete.description:
Will delete the Vacation that matches with the provided [id] from 
the Employee with [id]

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the searched Vacation

get.summary: get all the Comments from a Performance with [id]
get.description: This returns all the Comments of the Performance with [id].

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the Performance with comments

post.summary: creates a new Comment for the Performance with [id]
post.description: Will create a new Comment with the provided data in body, to the Performance with [id]

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the Performance to be commented

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: Comment data

get.description: Will return the Comment that matches with the provided [idComment]

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the Performance with comments

parameters.name: idComment
parameters.description: idComment of the searched Comment

put.description: Will update an Comment with the provided data in body if the Comment matches the [idComment]

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the Performance with comments

parameters.name: idComment
parameters.description: idComment of the Comment to be updated

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: Comment data

delete.description: Will delete an Comment if the Comment matches the [idComment]

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the Performance with comments

parameters.name: idComment
parameters.description: idComment of the Comment to be deleted

id.description: The unique identifier of the Employee

birthdate.description: The unix timestamp of the birthdate of the employee

dateJoined.description: The unix timestamp of the date joined of the employee

vacationDays.description: The number of vacation days allowed to the employee per year

remainingVacationDays.description: The number of vacation days allowed to the employee on the current year

IEmployee.description: An Employee contains all the current information of a current or onboarding employee

id.description: The unique identifier of the Employee

version.description: The number of the version of the Employee data

fkCreator.description: The unique identifier of the Employee that updated the data of the Employee

createdDate.description: The unix timestamp of the date the creation of this version of the employee data

birthdate.description: The unix timestamp of the birthdate of the employee

dateJoined.description: The unix timestamp of the date joined of the employee

vacationDays.description: The number of vacation days allowed to the employee per year

remainingVacationDays.description: The number of vacation days allowed to the employee on the current year

IEmployeeHistory.description: An Employee contains all the current information of a current or onboarding employee

id.description: The unique identifier of the Role

IRole.description: An Role is contains all the current information of a current or onboarding employee

id.description: The unique identifier of the Vacation

fkEmployee.description: The unique identifier of the Employee that requests the vacation

fkApprover.description: The unique identifier of the Employee that approves the vacation request

requestedDays.description: The number of vacation days the employee requested

date.description: The unix timestamp of the date when the employee requested the vacation

IVacation.description: A Vacation contains info of the employee asking for a vaction period

id.description: The unique identifier of the Role

fkDocumentType.description: The foreign key  of the DocumentType of this Document

fkEmployee.description: The foreign key  of the Employee that needs to upload this Document

createdDate.description: The unix timestamp of the created date of this Document

dueDate.description: The unix timestamp of the due date of this Document

expiryDate.description: The unix timestamp of the expiry date of this Document

IDocument.description: A Document required for the onbarding proccess of a new Employee

id.description: The unique identifier of the DocumentType

IDocumentType.description: A DocumentType contains info of the template support document for the onboarding process

id.description: The unique identifier of the Performance

fkEmployee.description: Foreign key of the employee with this performance review

date.description: The unix timestamp of the date the performance review was created

jabcGoals.description: Contains all the JABC Goals (Section 1) of this performance review

personalTargets.description: Contains all the Personal Targets (Section 2) of this performance review

objectives.description: Contains all the Objectives (Section 3) of this performance review

developmentGoals.description: Contains all the Development Goals (Section 4) of this performance review

comments.description: Contains all the comments (Section 5) of this performance review

IPerformance.description: A Performance contains info of a performance record of an employee

id.description: The unique identifier of the JABCGoal

fkPerformance.description: Foreign key of Performance that has this JABCGoal

IJABCGoal.description: A JABCGoal contains what another employee thinks about the performance record of another employee

id.description: The unique identifier of the PersonalTarget

fkPerformance.description: Foreign key of Performance that has this PersonalTarget

IPersonalTarget.description: A PersonalTarget contains what another employee thinks about the performance record of another employee

id.description: The unique identifier of the Objective

fkPerformance.description: Foreign key of Performance that has this Objective

IObjective.description: A Objective contains what another employee thinks about the performance record of another employee

id.description: The unique identifier of the DevelopmentGoal

fkPerformance.description: Foreign key of Performance that has this DevelopmentGoal

IDevelopmentGoal.description: A DevelopmentGoal contains what another employee thinks about the performance record of another employee

id.description: The unique identifier of the Comment

fkPerformance.description: Foreign key of Performance that has this Comment

fkCommenter.description: Foreign key of Employee that created the Comment

date.description: The unix timestamp of the date when the Comment was created

IComment.description: A Comment contains what another employee thinks about the performance record of another employee

ILogin.description: Represents the basic info to logged into the system

ILoginResponse.description: The data returned by the login path contains the employee info as well as the auth token

securityAuthToken.name: X-Auth-Token
securityAuthToken.description: Auth Token that grants access to the system

term.name: term
term.description: Search term for filter the data
